description:
Quick-wicking and durable, these bib shorts are tailored for the saddle, with a low-profile, cushioning chamois. The breathable body-mapped construction keeps you comfortable over long distances.

Designed to meet the demands of even the most adventurous rider and help you push your limits, the Cinder Cargo Bib Shorts have a breathable body-mapped construction and gender-specific chamois providing enduring comfort over distance. The Elastic Interface® Gravel Performance chamois is low-bulk and well ventilated, with unrivalled elastic recovery and energy absorption which allows you to keep clocking miles in the saddle across challenging terrain.

The bib style keeps the chamois in place and ensures a secure fit around your midriff, even when you’ve filled the generous stash pockets. Silicone grips help to keep the lower hem in position, while easy-reach mesh pockets give on-the-go access to supplies.

The Cinder Cargo Bib Shorts are built using a quick-wicking, fast-drying fabric finished with a fluorocarbon-free DWR, offering you the breathability you need when the gradient ramps up, aided by the ventilated back panel. Yet they’re also highly durable thanks to the reinforced saddle and sides while a seamless inner thigh cuts down on sore spots, so you can rely on them to help you go the distance in friction-free comfort.
name: Rab Cinder Cargo Bib Shorts - Mens
